body:
# Write

You can write your files using Markdown.

  • Page layouts
  • Collections
  • RSS Feeds
  • Automatic deployment on GitHub Pages (gh-pages)
  • Advanced Usage

This website is made using statinamic, so you can also check out the source code of this documentation as an example.

More to come.
rawBody:
## Write

You can write your files using
[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown).

- [Page layouts](layouts/)
- [Collections](collections/)
- [RSS Feeds](feeds/)
- [Automatic deployment on GitHub Pages (gh-pages)](gh-pages/)

This website is made using statinamic, so you can also check out

as an example.

_More to come._
raw:
---
title: How to use Statinamic
---

## Write

You can write your files using
[Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown).

- [Page layouts](layouts/)
- [Collections](collections/)
- [RSS Feeds](feeds/)
- [Automatic deployment on GitHub Pages (gh-pages)](gh-pages/)
- [Advanced Usage](../advanced/)

This website is made using statinamic, so you can also check out
[the source code of this documentation](https://github.com/MoOx/statinamic/tree/master/docs/content)
as an example.

_More to come._
